sorcer.service

Interface Tasker

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Remote, Service
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AccountProvider, ServiceTasker

    public interface Tasker
extends Service, Remote
    A Tasker is a service coordinating execution of all methods as specified by signatures associated with the instance of service Task and control flow exertion of task type.

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from interface sorcer.service.Service

        service, service
